mapper.select:
SELECT W.WEBTOON_CODE, W.WEBTOON_NAME, W.WEBTOON_LEVEL, W.WEBTOON_STATE, W.CATEGORY_CODE, W.PENALTY, W.NICKNAME, W.FUNDING_PERIOD, W.SUMMARY, W.WEBTOON_THUMBNAIL
,(SELECT SUBSCRIPTION_SEQUENCE FROM SUBSCRIPTION WHERE EMAIL = #{email} AND WEBTOON_CODE = W.WEBTOON_CODE) AS SEBSCRIPTION_SEQUENCE
FROM WEBTOON W join (SELECT WEBTOON_CODE, SUM(HITS) AS HITS FROM EPISODE GROUP BY WEBTOON_CODE) E on(W.WEBTOON_CODE = E.WEBTOON_CODE) WHERE LOWER(WEBTOON_LEVEL) = LOWER(#{webtoonLevel}) AND WEBTOON_STATE != 'blind'
AND LOWER(CATEGORY_CODE) = LOWER(#{categoryCode})
ORDER BY E.HITS desc

SELECT WEBTOON_NAME, WEBTOON_CODE, WEBTOON_STATE, CATEGORY_CODE, PENALTY, NICKNAME, FUNDING_PERIOD, SUMMARY, WEBTOON_THUMBNAIL
,(SELECT SUBSCRIPTION_SEQUENCE FROM SUBSCRIPTION WHERE EMAIL = #{email} AND WEBTOON_CODE = W.WEBTOON_CODE) AS SEBSCRIPTION_SEQUENCE
FROM WEBTOON W WHERE (WEBTOON_NAME LIKE #{keyword} OR NICKNAME LIKE #{keyword}) AND WEBTOON_STATE != 'blind'

SELECT EPISODE_SEQUENCE, WEBTOON_CODE, EPISODE_NUMBER, HITS, RECOMMENDATION, UPLOAD_DATE, EPISODE_TITLE, AUTHOR_WORD, THUMBNAIL, FUND_CODE FROM EPISODE WHERE WEBTOON_CODE = #{value} ORDER BY EPISODE_NUMBER DESC
SELECT EPISODE_FUND, WEBTOON_CODE, EPISODE_NUMBER, STATE_DATE, DUE_DATE FROM FUND WHERE FUND_CODE=#{fundCode}
SELECT FILE_NAME FROM IMAGE WHERE EPISODE_SEQUENCE = #{value} ORDER BY IMAGE_INDEX ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SUBSCRIPTION (SUBSCRIPTION_SEQUENCE, EMAIL, WEBTOON_CODE) VALUES (SUBSCRIPTION_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{email}, #{webtoonCode})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM SUBSCRIPTION WHERE EMAIL = #{email} AND WEBTOON_CODE = #{webtoonCode}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RECOMMEND (RECOMMEND_SEQUENCE, EMAIL, EPISODE_SEQUENCE) VALUES (RECOMMEND_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{email}, #{epicsodeSequence})
INSERT INTO REPORT (REPORT_SEQUENCE, EMAIL, WEBTOON_CODE, CONTENT, EPISODE_SEQUENCE) VALUES (REPORT_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{email}, #{webtoonCode}, #{content}, #{epicsodeSequence})
mapper.select: SELECT WEBTOON_CODE, WEBTOON_NAME, WEBTOON_LEVEL, WEBTOON_STATE, CATEGORY_CODE, PENALTY, NICKNAME, FUNDING_PERIOD, SUMMARY, WEBTOON_THUMBNAIL FROM WEBTOON WHERE WEBTOON_CODE = (SELECT WEBTOON_CODE FROM EPISODE WHERE EPISODE_SEQUENCE= #{value})
SELECT EPISODE_SEQUENCE, EPISODE_NUMBER, HITS, RECOMMENDATION, AUTHOR_WORD, UPLOAD_DATE, WEBTOON_CODE, EPISODE_TITLE, THUMBNAIL, FUND_CODE FROM EPISODE WHERE EPISODE_SEQUENCE= #{value}

mapper.select: SELECT RECOMMEND_SEQUENCE FROM RECOMMEND WHERE EPISODE_SEQUENCE = #{episodeSequence} AND EMAIL = #{email}

mapper.update: UPDATE EPISODE SET HITS = HITS+1 WHERE EPISODE_SEQUENCE = #{value}

SELECT WEBTOON_CODE, WEBTOON_NAME, WEBTOON_LEVEL, WEBTOON_STATE, CATEGORY_CODE, PENALTY, NICKNAME, FUNDING_PERIOD, SUMMARY, WEBTOON_THUMBNAIL FROM WEBTOON WHERE NICKNAME = #{nickname} AND LOWER(WEBTOON_STATE) = LOWER('COMPLETE')

SELECT WEBTOON_CODE, WEBTOON_NAME, WEBTOON_LEVEL, WEBTOON_STATE, CATEGORY_CODE, PENALTY, NICKNAME, FUNDING_PERIOD, SUMMARY, WEBTOON_THUMBNAIL FROM WEBTOON WHERE NICKNAME = #{nickname} AND LOWER(WEBTOON_LEVEL) = LOWER(#{webtoonLevel})
mapper.update: UPDATE WEBTOON SET WEBTOON_STATE=#{webtoonState} WHERE WEBTOON_CODE=#{webtoonCode}
mapper.select: SELECT E.EPISODE_SEQUENCE, E.EPISODE_NUMBER, E.HITS, E.RECOMMENDATION, E.UPLOAD_DATE, E.WEBTOON_CODE, E.EPISODE_TITLE, E.AUTHOR_WORD, E.THUMBNAIL, E.FUND_CODE, F.FUND_CODE, F.EPISODE_NUMBER, F.WEBTOON_CODE, F.EPISODE_FUND FROM EPISODE E LEFT OUTER JOIN FUND F ON E.FUND_CODE = F.FUND_CODE WHERE E.WEBTOON_CODE = #{value} AND (TRUNC(F.DUE_DATE) < TRUNC(SYSDATE+1) OR E.FUND_CODE IS NULL) ORDER BY E.EPISODE_NUMBER DESC

SELECT FUND_CODE, EPISODE_NUMBER, EPISODE_FUND, WEBTOON_CODE, TO_CHAR(TRUNC(START_DATE), 'YYYY/MM/DD') AS START_DATE, TO_CHAR(TRUNC(DUE_DATE), 'YYYY/MM/DD') AS DUE_DATE FROM FUND WHERE WEBTOON_CODE = #{value} AND (EPISODE_NUMBER NOT IN (SELECT EPISODE_NUMBER FROM EPISODE WHERE WEBTOON_CODE = #{value}) OR TRUNC(DUE_DATE) >= TRUNC(SYSDATE))
